verses.verse: And an angel <S%H4397><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from Gilgal <S%H1537><s%> to Bochim <S%H1066><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I made you to go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and have brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> you unto the land <S%H776><s%> which I sware <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%>; and I said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I will never <S%H5769><s%> break <S%H6565><s%> <S%H8686><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you.

And ye shall make <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8799><s%> no league <S%H1285><s%> with the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of this land <S%H776><s%>; ye shall throw down <S%H5422><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their altars <S%H4196><s%>: but ye have not obeyed <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%>: why have ye done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> this?

Wherefore I also said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, I will not drive them out <S%H1644><s%> <S%H8762><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you; but they shall be as tshofars in your sides <S%H6654><s%>, and their 'elohim <S%H430><s%> shall be a snare <S%H4170><s%> unto you.

And it came to pass, when the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%> unto all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, that the people <S%H5971><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their voice <S%H6963><s%>, and wept <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
And they called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of that place <S%H4725><s%> Bochim <S%H1066><s%>: and they sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8799><s%> there unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And when Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> had let the people <S%H5971><s%> go <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> unto his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> served <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%>, and all the days <S%H3117><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> that outlived <S%H748><s%> <S%H8689><s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H310><s%> Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%>, who had seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all the great <S%H1419><s%> works <S%H4639><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, that he did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>, the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, being an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>.

And they buried <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him in the border <S%H1366><s%> of his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> in Timnathheres <S%H8556><s%>, in the mount <S%H2022><s%> of Efrayim <S%H669><s%>, on the north side <S%H6828><s%> of the hill <S%H2022><s%> Gaash <S%H1608><s%>.

And also all that generation <S%H1755><s%> were gathered <S%H622><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto their fathers <S%H1><s%>: and there arose <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> another <S%H312><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them, which knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not the YY <S%H3068><s%>, nor yet the works <S%H4639><s%> which he had done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and served <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Baalim <S%H1168><s%>:

And they forsook <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, which brought them out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8688><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and followed <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, of the 'elohim <S%H430><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> that were round about <S%H5439><s%> them, and bowed <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%> themselves unto them, and provoked the YY <S%H3068><s%> to anger <S%H3707><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.
And they forsook <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and served <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Baal <S%H1168><s%> and Ashtaroth <S%H6252><s%>.

And the anger <S%H639><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> was hot <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and he delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of spoilers <S%H8154><s%> <S%H8802><s%> that spoiled <S%H8155><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them, and he sold <S%H4376><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, so that they could <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not any longer <S%H5750><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8800><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> their enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

Whithersoever they went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> was against them for evil <S%H7451><s%>, as the YY <S%H3068><s%> had said <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, and as the YY <S%H3068><s%> had sworn <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto them: and they were greatly <S%H3966><s%> distressed <S%H3334><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

Nevertheless the YY <S%H3068><s%> raised up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8686><s%> judges <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, which delivered <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of those that spoiled <S%H8154><s%> <S%H8802><s%> them.

And yet they would not hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto their judges <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, but they went a whoring <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8804><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, and bowed <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%> themselves unto them: they turned <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8804><s%> quickly <S%H4118><s%> out of the way <S%H1870><s%> which their fathers <S%H1><s%> walked in <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, obeying <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>; but they did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not so.

And when the YY <S%H3068><s%> raised <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them up judges <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, then the YY <S%H3068><s%> was with the judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and delivered <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of the judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: for it repented <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8735><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of their groanings <S%H5009><s%> by reason of them that oppressed <S%H3905><s%> <S%H8801><s%> them and vexed <S%H1766><s%> <S%H8802><s%> them.

And it came to pass, when the judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8802><s%> was dead <S%H4194><s%>, that they returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and corrupted <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8689><s%> themselves more than their fathers <S%H1><s%>, in following <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> 'elohim <S%H430><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them, and to bow down <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8692><s%> unto them; they ceased <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8689><s%> not from their own doings <S%H4611><s%>, nor from their stubborn <S%H7186><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>.

And the anger <S%H639><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> was hot <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; and he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Because that this people <S%H1471><s%> hath transgressed <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> which I commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> their fathers <S%H1><s%>, and have not hearkened <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto my voice <S%H6963><s%>;

I also will not henceforth <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> drive out <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8687><s%> any <S%H376><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> them of the nations <S%H1471><s%> which Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> left <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8804><s%> when he died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>:

That through them I may prove <S%H5254><s%> <S%H8763><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, whether they will keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> to walk <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> therein, as their fathers <S%H1><s%> did keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it, or not.

Therefore the YY <S%H3068><s%> left <S%H3240><s%> <S%H8686><s%> those nations <S%H1471><s%>, without <S%H1115><s%> driving them out <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8687><s%> hastily <S%H4118><s%>; neither delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> he them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%>.
